remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個類別提供存取至資料保護 API (DPAPI) 適用於 Windows XP 和更新版本的作業系統。This class provides access to the Data Protection API (DPAPI) available in the Windows XP and later operating systems. 這是一項服務，由作業系統提供，而且不需要額外的程式庫。This is a service that is provided by the operating system and does not require additional libraries. 它會提供記憶體中的敏感性資料加密。It provides encryption for sensitive data in memory. 類別包含兩個的包裝函式未受管理的 DPAPI，如和。The class consists of two wrappers for the unmanaged DPAPI, and . 這兩種方法可用來加密和解密記憶體中的資料。These two methods can be used to encrypt and decrypt data in memory. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用資料保護。The following example shows how to use data protection.
